definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Xylene and decalin are better solvents than the others.
sentences.chinese: 二甲苯和十氢萘是较好的溶剂。

sentences.english: The antiinflammatory effect was demonstrated using auricle edema induced by xylene in mice.
sentences.chinese: 采用二甲苯致小鼠耳廓肿胀观察其抗炎作用。

sentences.english: However, over the next few years is the expansion of our para-xylene peak.
sentences.chinese: 不过，未来几年也是我国对二甲苯扩能的高峰期。

sentences.english: The blend treated mechanically was extracted by xylon and aceton one by one.
sentences.chinese: 经过力化学处理过的混合物用二甲苯和丙酮逐一浸取。

sentences.english: The yield of O-alkylation of 2,5-dimethylphenol with the monohalogen carboxylic esters is above 81%.
sentences.chinese: 二甲苯酚与一卤代羧酸酯的反应产率在81%以上。

sentences.english: The dimethylbenzenes are obtained from catalytic reformate.
sentences.chinese: 二甲苯可从催化重整得到。

sentences.english: It is separated from the xylene mixture by crystallization or zeolite adsorption.
sentences.chinese: 它由二甲苯混合物经结晶或沸石吸附分离制得。

sentences.english: The aromatics are ringed hydrocarbons, such as benzene, toluene and xylene. Benzene is used to make polystyrenes (e.g.
sentences.chinese: 芳烃是环状碳氢化合物，如苯，甲苯和二甲苯。

sentences.english: However, toluene and xylene are toxic substances.
sentences.chinese: 但是，甲苯和二甲苯都是有毒的物质。

sentences.english: In this pater the separation of the isomers of xylene by using the adsorption separation technology is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了采用吸附分离技术分离二甲苯异构体。

sentences.english: More p-xylene may be obtained by disproportionation and isomerization of alkylbenzenes.
sentences.chinese: 烷基苯通过异构化和歧化可望得到更多的对二甲苯。

sentences.english: The technical fluorene has been refined from the heavy wash oil with xylene.
sentences.chinese: 以重质洗油为原料，二甲苯为溶剂精制工业芴。

sentences.english: Phthalic anhydride residue is the by product from oxidation of naphthalene oro xylene.
sentences.chinese: 苯酐渣系萘氧化或邻二甲苯氧化的副产物。

sentences.english: Thereafter the bottle is filled to the lip with commercial grade xylene.
sentences.chinese: 然后，将工业品二甲苯放入瓶中，使达到瓶口。

sentences.english: Clearing agents include benzene and xylene.
sentences.chinese: 透明剂包括苯和二甲苯。
